resources.string:
Add Card Set

To create a new card set, please tap on the plus icon on the action bar.

Delete Card Set

Tap and hold on the list item that you want to delete, and the \"Delete\" menu will show up. Then tap on delete, and confirm the deletion dialog.

Add Card

Tap and hold on the list item to which you want to add a card, and the \"Add Card\" menu will show up. Then tap on add.

In order to access Flashcard Exchange, you have to create an account with that service.

Please see:
www.flashcardexchange.com

Enter content for the card\'s front side. Then tap on the save icon, which flips the card so that you can enter content for the card\'s back side. Then tap on the save icon, which adds the card.

You can continue adding cards, or click on the cancle button to return to the card set list.

Tap anywhere on the card to switch between the front and backside of the card.

Change cards by swiping left and right.
